storyInfo: Worried about the Trilby Asher, the viscount searches for him, only to stumble upon the Trilby Asher and Degenbrecher in a 'standoff.' Sensing the situation is awry, he turns and runs, with Degenbrecher chasing after him.

attributes.content: ...That's the honey drink I'm talking about. It's got a sweet taste at first, but I didn't expect it to hit me so hard after!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It wasn't really all that bad, though. My friend said I was honey drunk, but in the end, I was as sober as can be, and she was totally wasted.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hm? Hey? Dedushka?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hey! Are you listening?
attributes.name: Leto
Harold
attributes.content: Hmm...

attributes.name: Harold
attributes.content: Oh?
Forgive me, Rosalind. What did you just say?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: She was totally blitzed on honey!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, right, right. Of course, on honey.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Ugh... c'mon...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: If you have something on your mind, you should just deal with it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're barely even here. How are we supposed to have a conversation?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No, no, there is nothing more worthy of my attention than your story right now.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Please, tell me more about honey drunkenness. If I recall correctly, they do offer specialty beverages made with honey on this train.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Alright, that's enough.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: My eyes are pretty sharp. You've been acting weird since that guy in the hat showed up.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Is he your friend...? No, you don't look like friends.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: So you must be enemies?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Not quite.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Perhaps the two of us can just barely be described as colleagues. We don't work for the same department of the company, however.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Okay, so he's a colleague you don't get along with, bumping into you on vacation.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I love the way you describe it.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Right then, Rosalind. I'll admit I'm a little worried my colleague may not get his work done quite satisfactorily, so please excuse me for a short while.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: By way of apology, I will secure for you a honey beverage. Its main ingredient is a Kjerag specialty, highland honey. Each and every drop is Kjeragandr's blessing, pure and unadulterated...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Really? I'm pretty much desensitized to all that Kjeragandr marketing talk though...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Without a doubt.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: But you did tell me your friend said you get honey drunk, so I'd like us to make a promise to one other. One bottle per day, at most. Let's keep you from actually getting drunk on our trip.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: There's no need for things to be so tense between us, Madam Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Her Grace's heart lies with Karlan Trade, and she is also keenly interested in Kjerag's continued development. It is my job to keep an eye on all aspects of the country.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This is no different. There's no reason for you to be on alert.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: So your job description includes visiting train cabins?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The changes this place has been through are quite shocking, are they not?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: From what I understand, they've deployed Victorian rolling stock on this route extending from the foot of Mount Karlan to Lake Silberneherze.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: But this series of trains has gone through significant modification since its initial deployment.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: As the first to sow the seeds in all this, Her Grace is struck with admiration for Karlan Trade's technological improvements in these three short years.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: If Gnosis hadn't done all this, then Enciodes would've been in deep trouble after speaking up for him.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You're going to discuss technology with me?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You're talking to the wrong person, then. Better find Gnosis yourself. He might be interested.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Most curious, Madam.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I did not expect to find you here, much less under these circumstances.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Who exactly is it that necessitated your personal intervention? What kind of situation could be so urgent and precarious that... you haven't even the time to change your bloodstained gloves?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I dealt with a small issue, that's all.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: This is not the right time for your curiosity, Trilby Asher, and I suggest you abandon it.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm here looking for someone, and I don't want to dirty another pair of gloves for the time being.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I mean no offense.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: And I don't mean to interfere with your work in any way.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: It's just... surely there must be someone important aboard?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: And if there is?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: If you wouldn't mind divulging some details to me, perhaps I could be of some assistance.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: After all... finding people is one of the tasks that we handle on a day-to-day basis.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You seem to be mistaken.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I beg your pardon?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Enciodes might be willing to turn a blind eye to you sticking your nose here. That's his choice, and none of my business.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: But I don't share his patience.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Do you know what's so much nicer about Kjerag than Kazimierz?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The place is cold, but consequently, there aren't as many insects around.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The flying ones buzz around until you can't help but squash them dead.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Now you'd best behave yourself, or I will act in Enciodes's stead.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Thank you for the advice.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This is not advice. It's a warning.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Enough chit-chat. Are you through wasting my time?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: What luck, the man I'm looking for is eavesdropping on the other side of that door.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Erk.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Madam Degenbrecher—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Before he can finish his sentence, a flash of cold, white light sweeps past his field of vision.

The pressure the Trilby Asher managed to exert is suppressed within himself. The signature hat on his head is suddenly split into two down its brim, at last revealing a hint of the fear the disguised spy is feeling.
The woman's hand rests on her weapon, apparently casually. Her gaze makes it clear to the Trilby Asher that—
Right now, he is prey to a ferocious beast.
I don't want this train decommissioned.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Don't make me say it again.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Out of the way.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: If you'd rather I make my own way, that would be fine, too.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: (This has certainly got to be a joke!)
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: (The Black Knight in the flesh... In Kazimierz, they would print the image of the bloodied Black Knight on rare foil cards!)
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: (Set the Trilby Asher aside... Even the Black Knight is on this train...?)
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: (Oh, and me—A Victorian viscount, personally named by the Black Knight as the one she's looking for. What a star-studded cast! Inconceivable!)
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: (I need somebody to tell me right now this is all some kind of impromptu entertainment... That's what I need!)
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Lisburn?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I need you to check for me right now if Karlan Trade has made any strange moves—
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: No, never mind. First, make sure our men are safe!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Our men? They're all fine in the barracks. We all went back after we chauffeured you to the station. Saw nothing strange whatsoever.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: But Jefferson and the lads are not yet back from their drinking contest... I'll have someone find them right now.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: What's the matter, Harold? The way you're talking, is something up?
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Everything is fine for now. For now.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I hope I'm merely overthinking this...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Anyway, confirm their status and have them report in immediately! Even if they've drunk themselves to death, pick them back up and get them to report in before they drop dead again!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Understood. I'm on it.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: O Kjeragandr, if you're really omnipresent and omniscient as the people here say—
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Now is the time for you to appear.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Please don't abandon a faithful traveler.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If I can't be a good, proper guest, I may have no choice but to be an unwelcome guest.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: So that's the gist of it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The signal here is kinda wonky. I gave it a try, but I got almost no signal at all in the cabin. It's a little better in the corridor.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Good thing Aurora set this up for us ahead of time. Otherwise, I probably wouldn't have a way to get in touch.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What could happen to me? Relax, I'm fine.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Alright! I'll leave it to you to get in touch with the landship. Say hello to the others for me!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'll hang up now. Later.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: This should take care of it...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Rosalind!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Waugh!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, it's you. You spooked me...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What are you doing? Are you running from somebody?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Terribly sorry, but now is not the time to discuss this.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Rosalind, why didn't you stay in the cabin?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Uh, I wanted some fresh air.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Got a problem with that?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, not at all. Fresh air is a fine thing.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It's just—
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: ...A shame. Seems we won't have much time for an explanation.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Rosalind, you go on back to the cabin—Wait, no, you can't. The Trilby Asher has already seen you.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: (Besides, he said she looked 'familiar'...)
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Trilby Asher? You mean your colleague with the weird hat?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Yes, exactly. That's him!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I ran into some small trouble, Rosalind.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Let me say this now. It was not my intent to bring you into this mess. However...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I don't want some strange man to come propositioning you because he's failed to find me.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Huh? Propositioning?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I just ignore those weirdos. And if they can't take a hit, I sock 'em right in the nose!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Not a bad idea. If ever you find the chance, please do.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: But there are certain men who don't give up simply because they've been punched in the face by a young lady...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: So, I'd like to offer you an invitation to the dining car, to sample the honey beverages there and evade the stubborn flirts.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Hm, so you mean you want to drink honey with me?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Yes, let us proceed to imbibe the honey drink.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: And you want to run all the way there?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hah, yes, let us proceed to run all the way there.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Heh, they've almost caught up to you, haven't they? I can hear their footsteps!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You really aren't hiding none of it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I said as much. I would never lie to a lady.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Alright, I've got no idea what kind of ruckus you guys are stirring up...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But it sounds pretty fun. I'm in!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Pleasure to have you onboard.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Then, without further ado—
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Now! Quick, we have to run!
attributes.name: Harold
